com.spotify.flo.freezer

Class PersistingContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spotify.flo.context.ForwardingEvalContext
      • com.spotify.flo.freezer.PersistingContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EvalContext

    public class PersistingContext
extends ForwardingEvalContext
    A EvalContext that serializes and persist tasks. Any call to EvalContext.evaluate(Task) will persist the task and recurse to also do so for all input tasks. No task in the dependency tree will actually be invoked. Instead EvalContext.evaluate(Task) will return a Value that always fails.

    After the returned Value has failed, all persisted file paths can be received through getFiles().
